title: 15. Getting started with fermented foods the easy way
description:
You’ll hear me talk about fermented foods quite frequently here and for good reason. If there is ever such a “health food” it should be this. Adding fermented foods to your family's diet can sound complicated, but I promise anyone can do it. 

Get our family's five favorite kefir smoothies HERE. 

Grab my guide here: Lacto Fermentation: Guide To Fermenting Vegetables

You can find Michelle Visser's Kombucha resources HERE.
